trans-unit.source: Service Communication Model Overview
trans-unit.target: Service Communication Model Overview

trans-unit.source: This article describes the basics of Communication model supported by the Reliable Service's api.
trans-unit.target: This article describes the basics of Communication model supported by the Reliable Service's api.

trans-unit.source: Service Communication Model
trans-unit.target: Service Communication Model

trans-unit.source: The Reliable Services programming model allows service authors to specify the communication mechanism they want to use to expose their service endpoints and also provides abstractions which clients can use to discover and communicate with the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: The Reliable Services programming model allows service authors to specify the communication mechanism they want to use to expose their service endpoints and also provides abstractions which clients can use to discover and communicate with the service endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Setting up the Service communication stack
trans-unit.target: Setting up the Service communication stack

trans-unit.source: Reliable Services API allows service authors to plugin the communication stack of their choice in the service by implementing the following method in their service,
trans-unit.target: Reliable Services API allows service authors to plugin the communication stack of their choice in the service by implementing the following method in their service,

trans-unit.source: The ICommunicationListener interface defines the interface that must be implemented by the communication listener for a service.
trans-unit.target: The ICommunicationListener interface defines the interface that must be implemented by the communication listener for a service.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints that are required for the service are described via the <link><linkText>Service manifest</linkText><title></title></link> under the Endpoints section.
trans-unit.target: The endpoints that are required for the service are described via the <link><linkText>Service manifest</linkText><title></title></link> under the Endpoints section.

trans-unit.source: The communication listener can access the endpoint resources allocated to it from the CodePackageActivationContext in the ServiceInitializationParameters, and start listening for requests when it is opened.
trans-unit.target: The communication listener can access the endpoint resources allocated to it from the CodePackageActivationContext in the ServiceInitializationParameters, and start listening for requests when it is opened.

trans-unit.source: The Endpoints resources are common to the entire service package and are allocated by Service Fabric when the service package is activated.
trans-unit.target: The Endpoints resources are common to the entire service package and are allocated by Service Fabric when the service package is activated.

trans-unit.source: So all the replicas hosted in the same ServiceHost share the same port.
trans-unit.target: So all the replicas hosted in the same ServiceHost share the same port.

trans-unit.source: This means that the communication listener should support port sharing.
trans-unit.target: This means that the communication listener should support port sharing.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way of doing this, is for the communication listener to use the partition Id and replica/instance Id when generating the listen address.
trans-unit.target: The recommended way of doing this, is for the communication listener to use the partition Id and replica/instance Id when generating the listen address.

trans-unit.source: Client to Service Communication
trans-unit.target: Client to Service Communication

trans-unit.source: Reliable Services API provides the following abstractions which make writing clients for communicating with Services easy.
trans-unit.target: Reliable Services API provides the following abstractions which make writing clients for communicating with Services easy.

trans-unit.source: ServicePartitionResolver
trans-unit.target: ServicePartitionResolver

trans-unit.source: ServicePartitionResolver class helps the client to determine the endpoint of a Service Fabric service at runtime.
trans-unit.target: ServicePartitionResolver class helps the client to determine the endpoint of a Service Fabric service at runtime.

trans-unit.source: The process of determining the endpoint of a service is referred to as Service Endpoint Resolution in Service Fabric terminology.
trans-unit.target: The process of determining the endpoint of a service is referred to as Service Endpoint Resolution in Service Fabric terminology.

trans-unit.source: FabricClient is the object that is used to communicate to the Service Fabric cluster for various management operations on the Service Fabric cluster.
trans-unit.target: FabricClient is the object that is used to communicate to the Service Fabric cluster for various management operations on the Service Fabric cluster.

trans-unit.source: Typically client code need not work with ServicePartitionResolver directly.
trans-unit.target: Typically client code need not work with ServicePartitionResolver directly.

trans-unit.source: It is created and passed on to other helper classes in the Reliable Service's API, which internally use the resolver and help the client communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: It is created and passed on to other helper classes in the Reliable Service's API, which internally use the resolver and help the client communicate with the service.

trans-unit.source: CommunicationClientFactory
trans-unit.target: CommunicationClientFactory

trans-unit.source: ICommunicationClientFactory defines the base interface implemented by a communication client factory that produces clients that can talk to a ServiceFabric service. The implementation of the CommunicationClientFactory will depend on the communication stack used by the Service Fabric service to which the client wants to communicate to. Reliable Service's API provides a CommunicationClientFactoryBase which provides a base implementation of this ICommunicationClientFactory interface and performs tasks which are common for all the communication stacks.(like using a ServicePartitionResolver to determine the service endpoint). Clients usually implement the abstract CommunicationClientFactoryBase class to handle communication stack specific logic.
trans-unit.target: ICommunicationClientFactory defines the base interface implemented by a communication client factory that produces clients that can talk to a ServiceFabric service. The implementation of the CommunicationClientFactory will depend on the communication stack used by the Service Fabric service to which the client wants to communicate to. Reliable Service's API provides a CommunicationClientFactoryBase which provides a base implementation of this ICommunicationClientFactory interface and performs tasks which are common for all the communication stacks.(like using a ServicePartitionResolver to determine the service endpoint). Clients usually implement the abstract CommunicationClientFactoryBase class to handle communication stack specific logic.

trans-unit.source: ServicePartitionClient
trans-unit.target: ServicePartitionClient

trans-unit.source: ServicePartitionClient uses the CommunicationClientFactory(and internally the ServicePartitionResolver) and helps in communicating with the service by handling retries for common communication and Service Fabric Transient exceptions.
trans-unit.target: ServicePartitionClient uses the CommunicationClientFactory(and internally the ServicePartitionResolver) and helps in communicating with the service by handling retries for common communication and Service Fabric Transient exceptions.
